exclusion.criterion: previous vaccination with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: previous vaccination with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has high blood pressure, signs of septicemia, respiratory failure, renal failure, microangiopathic hemolytic anemia, thrombocytopenia, elevated lactate dehydrogenase and reduced human complement C3 levels. He was diagnosed with atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome and treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids.
